article_title: McHugh David: Imbalanced law creates an imbalanced market
article_text: The Livingston Parish Animal Shelter, located on Hwy. 190 in the Town in Livingston, has many dogs in need of loving homes. The shelter is open Tuesday through Saturday. For more information, call 225-686-7798.

article_metadata.author: Follow the Money

og.description: President Barack Obama and his staff want to help the Middle Class. He stated as much while he was campaigning, and came out swinging with the Affordable Care Act.

The Livingston Parish Animal Shelter, located on Hwy.
190 in the Town in Livingston, has many dogs in need of loving homes.
The shelter is open Tuesday through Saturday.
